MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA8 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in River Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12.03pm. Our engineers have arrived at John Street substaion and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.32pm on Tuesday 1st December 2020
